text: Aequorivita vladivostokensis is a Gram-negative, strictly aerobic, non-spore- forming, heterotrophic and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Aequorivita which has been isolated from the Troitsa Bay from the Sea of Japan. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Aequorivita vladivostokensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Flavobacteria Category:Bacteria described in 2003
title: Aequorivita vladivostokensis
